com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.idmanagement

Class AbstractIDAuthority

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.idmanagement.AbstractIDAuthority
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDAuthority
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsistentKeyIDAuthority

    public abstract class AbstractIDAuthority
extends Object
implements IDAuthority
    Base Class for IDAuthority implementations. Handles common aspects such as maintaining the IDBlockSizer and shared configuration options
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Detail

      • setIDBlockSizer

        public void setIDBlockSizer(IDBlockSizer sizer)
        Description copied from interface: IDAuthority
        Sets the IDBlockSizer to be used by this IDAuthority. The IDBlockSizer specifies the block size for each partition guaranteeing that the same partition will always be assigned the same block size.

        The IDBlockSizer cannot be changed for an IDAuthority that has already been used (i.e. after invoking #getIDBlock(int).

        Specified by:
        setIDBlockSizer in interface IDAuthority
        Parameters:
        sizer - The IDBlockSizer to be used by this IDAuthority

      • getUniqueID

        public String getUniqueID()
        Description copied from interface: IDAuthority
        Return the globally unique string used by this IDAuthority instance to recognize its ID allocations and distinguish its allocations from those belonging to other IDAuthority instances. This should normally be the value of GraphDatabaseConfiguration.UNIQUE_INSTANCE_ID, though that's not strictly technically necessary.
        Specified by:
        getUniqueID in interface IDAuthority
        Returns:
        unique ID string
